errors.429: Your requests exceed the rate limit, please try again later.

oauth.instruction.title: Use Mixin on your phone to scan the code
oauth.instruction.install: Search Mixin in Google Play or App Store

home.nav.title: Secure digital assets and messages on Mixin
home.section.network: A free, lightning fast and decentralized network for transferring digital assets.
home.section.messenger: An open source cryptocurrency wallet with Signal messaging.

homepage.slogan: A secure, easy-to-use, and privacy decentralized digital asset network

mn.title: Mixin Network
mn.description: A PoS + BFT + DAG decentralized multi-chain asset network

pos.title: PoS
pos.description:
Mixin Network is a PoS Mainnet. By staking 2% of the XIN in circulation, anyone can run a common node, or pledge a small amount of XIN to join as a verification node.

The Mainnet focuses on transactions, and the performance can be more than one million TPS, the final irreversible confirmation is less than 1 second, and it's free.

layer2.title: Layer 2
layer2.description: Mixin Network is a Layer 2 multi-chain ledger without currency issuance function, All assets are deposited from outside. Users manage their assets of multiple public blockchains by their own private keys.

dag.title: DAG
dag.description: Mixin uses DAG as the underlying data structure model, but is different from other DAG public chains (such as IOTA, Bytaball, etc.). Mixin does not have a central authority node, and the data does not require the final confirmation from the central authority node.

tee.title: TEE
tee.description: Mixin Network uses Intel SGX as the implementation of TEE to ensure security. All nodes must run in a trusted execution environment to ensure that no one can change the running code in the trusted execution environment without being noticed.

crypto_note.title: CryptoNote
crypto_note.description: Enhancing UTXO transaction privacy through CryptoNote, the transaction is known by participants only, even Mainnet cannot know the transaction party.

mtg.title: MTG
mtg.description: MTG（Mixin Trusted Group）is a solution that replaces smart contracts. Similar to the sharding technology of Ethereum, each MTG is composed of multiple independent nodes. And reach consensus through the multi-signature technology of the Mixin Mainnet.

security.title: Security
security.description: In addition to the security mechanism of the MTG node itself, the multi-signature assets managed by MTG will also be protected by the Mixin Network mainnet.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: Developers can use any programing language (Go, Java, PHP, Rust, etc.) to implement MTG, and can flexibly form a decentralized parallel network that requires or does not require a license.

tip.title: TIP
tip.description: TIP (Throttled Identity Protocol) is a decentralized key management protocol, that manages digital assets safely and simply through a 6-digit password.

network.title: Decentralized Signature Network
network.description: Decentralized Signature Network is composed of many nodes. The nodes run a distributed key generation protocol to authenticate signature requests from users.

manager.title: Trusted Account Management Service
manager.description: Provide user identity seed, usually through e-mail or phone.

pin.title: Users' PIN Code
pin.description: Through a PIN password and the identity seed of the account manager, with the response of different of signature nodes, finally derives the private key.

mm.title: Mixin Messenger
mm.description: Mixin Messenger is an open-source E2EE chat APP and multi-chain wallet supported by Mixin Network.

chat.title: E2EE Chat
chat.description: Base on Signal E2EE protocol, all messages are encrypted, includes audio, images and files, and supports up to 256 people encrypted group chat.

wallet.title: Multi Chain Wallet
wallet.description: Combining the multi-chain wallet of Mixin Network with the decentralized 6-digit digital password solution provided by TIP, users can use digital wallets safely, simply and privately, while enjoying the experience of free and lightning fast digital assets transfer.

bot.title: Bots
bot.description: Besides E2EE chat and wallet, Mixin Messenger also supports bots. Developers can easily implement the bots with different programming languages.

ecosystem.slogan: Decentralized products that are safe, private and used at the same time

messenger.name: Mixin Messenger
messenger.description: Mixin is a messenger with end-to-end encryption built on the Signal protocol. Besides its messaging features, Mixin supports wallet and transfer functionality for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Zcash, Dogocoin, Horizen, XEM, Dash, Litecoin and Sia.

poolin.name: Poolin Wallet
poolin.description: Poolin Wallet guarantees security of cryptocurrency assets, which supports multifunctional operation of BTC, ETH, LTC, ZEC... More currencies are being optimized.

fennec.name: Fennec
fennec.description: Fennec is an open source browser extension wallet for Mixin Network.

4swap.name: 4swap
4swap.description: A fully decentralized protocol for automated liquidity provision.

leaf.name: Pando Leaf
leaf.description: A decentralized financial network, implement a derivatives liquidity protocol.

rings.name: Pand Rings
rings.description: An algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol.

mixswap.name: MixSwap
mixswap.description: MixSwap is the MiFi DEX aggregation trading platform of Exin.

exinlocal.name: ExinLocal
exinlocal.description: ExinLocal is a worldwide peer-to-peer marketplace where buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

links.name: Links
links.description: An end-to-end encryption messenger built on the Signal protocol.

exinearn.name: ExinEarn
exinearn.description: A platform where you can get bitcoin rewards for eating, drinking and playing

exinone.name: ExinOne
exinone.description: Start investing in digital assets such as Bitcoin in one minute

blockchair.name: BlockChair
blockchair.description: Blockchain explorer, analytics and web services

bwatch.name: B.Watch
bwatch.description: BOX is a completely open and transparent fund product. It consists of 7 standard samples, which are BTC, ETH, EOS, DOT, MOB, XIN, and UNI.

oceanone.name: OceanONE
oceanone.description: Ocean ONE is a decentralized exchange built on Mixin Network, it's almost the first time that a decentralized exchange gain the same user experience as a centralized one.

bigdex.name: BigDex
bigdex.description: BigDEX has launched the PairLaunch function which provides all users to list the tokens.

coinview.name: CoinView
coinview.description: CoinView is a free app combining the best cryptocurrency market monitoring and portfolio management tools.

messenger.features.description: An open source cryptocurrency wallet, which supports almost all popular cryptocurrencies.
messenger.features.1: Login with mobile phone number, never lose your account
messenger.features.3: All assets are stored in PoS-BFT-DAG distributed network
messenger.features.4: Enormous bots to extend the chat and wallet capabilities
messenger.features.5: Send cryptocurrencies directly to phone contacts
messenger.features.6: Send encrypted messages with Signal protocol
messenger.desktop.title: Mixin Messenger Desktop
messenger.desktop.description1: macOS 10.9 and higher or Windows 64-bit, Linux download from
messenger.desktop.description3: Mixin Messenger must be installed on your phone.
